gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 121, Rockets 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Rockets, 121-113. GG Jackson recorded 20 points, nine rebounds, and three blocks for the Grizzlies, with Jaren Jackson Jr. adding 18 points and three assists in the victory. Amen Thompson tallied 19 points, 12 rebounds, and two assists for the Rockets in the losing effort. The Grizzlies improve to 19-36, while the Rockets fall to 24-30.
